welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Allendale, where charm and hospitality await you! Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community, we invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer and create unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Park Township Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Park Township Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free wifi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gerald R. Ford International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Gerald R. Ford International Airport serves as a hub for several major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Gerald R. Ford International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.
